title: 特朗普質疑中美貿易談判能否成功　道指跌逾百點

replies.msg:
http://www2.hkej.com/instantnews/international/article/1846239/

特朗普質疑中美貿易談判能否成功 道指跌逾百點
今日 02:12

CNBC電視報道，美國總統特朗普周四表示，他質疑美國正與中國舉行的貿易談判能否取得成功。

特朗普的評論曝光後，美股道指擴大跌幅至超過100點。



應美國財長努欽邀請，中共中央政治局委員、國務院副總理劉鶴率領的代表團，目前正在華盛頓訪問，與美國政府高層就貿易關係展開會談。CNBC早前引述與會人士透露，劉鶴對與美國達成貿易協議樂觀。

劉鶴周三在華盛頓分別會見美國前國務卿基辛格(Henry Kissinger)、臨時參議長、參議院財委會主席哈奇(Orrin Hatch)，以及眾議院籌款委員會主席布雷迪(Kevin Brady)等議員。

https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/17/trump-says-he-doubts-china-trade-negotiations-will-succeed.html

Trump says he doubts China trade negotiations will succeed

President Donald Trump says he doubts trade talks with China will succeed.

His comments come as Chinese officials negotiate with the Trump administration on trade.

Jacob Pramuk | @jacobpramuk
Published 17 Mins Ago Updated 1 Min Ago


Qilai Shen | Bloomberg | Getty Images

U.S. President Donald Trump, left, and Xi Jinping, China's president, shake hands during a news conference at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, China, on Thursday, Nov. 9, 2017.

President Donald Trump said Thursday that he doubts ongoing trade negotiations with China will succeed.

A Chinese delegation is currently in Washington taking part in talks with top Trump administration officials. The meetings follow a separate round of negotiations in Beijing earlier in the month.

The U.S. and China hope to bring down escalating tensions that threaten to start a trade war and damage the world's two largest economies. U.S. stock markets dipped following Trump's comments, as observers hope trade talks will avoid major tariffs proposed by both countries.

Speaking to reporters Thursday during an appearance with NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg, the president said China has taken advantage of the U.S. for years on trade. China will not rip off the U.S. any longer, Trump contended.

The president has long argued that China's massive trade surplus with the U.S. constitutes a trade abuse. He has also sought to punish Beijing for alleged intellectual property theft by Chinese companies.

Tensions between Peter Navarro, Trump's trade advisor and a China hawk, and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin have complicated this week's talks. Navarro has sought a tough response to China, which has led him to bump heads with colleagues in the Trump administration.

This story is developing. Please check back for updates.

Jacob Pramuk
Staff Reporter
侵侵又用假希望撚鳩班支那豬

Trump: I 'doubt' China trade negotiations will succeed

Jacob Pramuk | @jacobpramuk
Published 48 Mins Ago Updated Moments Ago

https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/17/trump-says-he-doubts-china-trade-negotiations-will-succeed.html

President Donald Trump said Thursday that he doubts high-stakes trade negotiations with China will succeed.

"Will that be successful? I tend to doubt it," the president told reporters during an appearance with NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg. "The reason I doubt it is because China has become very spoiled. The European Union has become very spoiled. Other countries have become very spoiled, because they always got 100 percent of whatever they wanted from the United States."

"But we can't allow that to happen anymore," Trump added.
